reviewtext: My previous router gave up the ghost after about three years. Its installation had been complicated and very time-consuming.  I was not looking forward to replacing it. My good experience with LinkSys products, including my cable modem, led me to this choice. In addition, it was available at a good price and had the necessary capacity for my home office setup. I plugged it in, powered up, and everything performed flawlessly. I didn't even have to install drivers or any software. It has continued to work without incident. I am a very happy camper. Thanks, LinkSys!
